articles.content: Though we still dont know too much about Nope, the next horror film from writer-director Jordan Peele (writer-director of Get Out and Us; co-writer of Candyman) we do know that were dying to see itan… [+797 chars]

articles.title: Best Valentines Day movies 2022: Here are 10 most highly rated Netflix romcoms, as per Rotten Tomatoes - The Scotsman
articles.description: Looking for some Netflix and chill for your Valentine’s Day celebrations? Then check out these 10 highly rated hits films from the streaming platform.
articles.content:
Film critics may be hard on them for their cringe factor, but the romcom have become a staple of cinema, with film fans increasingly fond of a good romance on the big screen.
